text:
All Departments with recorded telephonic messages about the Department's operation or services shall maintain such messages in each language spoken by a Substantial Number of Limited English Speaking Persons or where applicable a Concentrated Number of Limited English Speaking Persons. Such Departments are encouraged to include in the telephonic messages information about business hours, office location(s), services offered and the means of accessing such services, and the availability of language assistance. If the Department is governed by a Commission, the messages shall include the time, date, and place of the Commission's meetings. 
(Added by Ord. 126-01, File No. 010409, App. 6/15/2001)
